statements: SELECT project_id, project_name FROM research_projects;
SELECT * FROM research_projects WHERE start_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT project_name, milestone FROM research_projects ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT project_id, end_date FROM research_projects WHERE deadline < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT deadline FROM research_projects WHERE milestone IS NULL;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM research_projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM research_projects WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, milestone FROM research_projects WHERE deadline <= '2023-06-30' AND milestone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT project_id, project_name, deadline FROM research_projects WHERE milestone LIKE 'Complete%';
SELECT project_id, project_name, deadline FROM research_projects WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM research_projects;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM research_projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM research_projects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, milestone_name, deadline_date FROM research_projects JOIN project_milestones ON research_projects.project_id = project_milestones.project_id;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM research_projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM research_projects WHERE project_id = 1

SELECT project_id, project_name, milestone_name FROM research_projects JOIN project_milestones ON research_projects.project_id = project_milestones.project_id
SELECT * FROM research_projects;
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM research_projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT milestone_name, deadline FROM milestones WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT team_name, member_name FROM project_team WHERE project_id = 2 ORDER BY team_name ASC;

SELECT * FROM research_projects ORDER BY project_id DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM research_projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01'

SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM research_projects;
SELECT milestone_id, milestone_name, milestone_date, project_id FROM milestones ORDER BY milestone_date DESC;

SELECT milestone_name, milestone_date FROM milestones WHERE project_id = 2 ORDER BY milestone_date DESC;

SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date, milestone_name, milestone_date FROM research_projects JOIN milestones ON research_projects.project_id = milestones.project_id WHERE research_projects.project_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM Projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, end_date FROM Projects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT researcher_name, department FROM Researchers ORDER BY researcher_name ASC;

SELECT researcher_name, department, project_name FROM Researchers JOIN Projects ON Researchers.project_id = Projects.project_id;
SELECT milestone_name, milestone_date, project_name FROM Milestones JOIN Projects ON Milestones.project_id = Projects.project_id ORDER BY milestone_date DESC;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM Tasks WHERE task_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
